column1: The Pit Room////The turkey our friends had looked pretty good
column2: so I'd try that next time. They also have giant beef ribs
column3: but bring your appetite if you want those. They only sell it in 1-pound increments. The Mac and cheese was phenomenal
column4: and perhaps a reason to come in itself. The perfect amount of cheesiness
column5: just soaking in gooeyness. The beans were good
column6: but I won't write home about them.
